query: select distinct    current_database()  , isc.table_schema  , schema_owner  , isc.table_name  , isc.column_name  , isc.data_type  , isc.is_nullable  from information_schema.columns isc  left outer join information_schema.schemata iss on isc.table_schema = iss.schema_name where table_schema not in ('information_schema', 'pg_catalog')
